Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[StifferVehicl: The Max Position modifier for all vehicles. Vanilla is 1.0, Default for Mod is 3.0 Higher values makes vehicles lean less, but it might look harsher.
The Damping modifier for all vehicles. Vanilla is 1.0, Default for Mod is 2.0 Higher values makes vehicles bounce more. Low values are stiffer.
Reset the modifiers to the default values.
